articles.title: Kareena Kapoor And Saif Ali Khan Sign Off From Africa Like This - NDTV Movies
articles.description: "Leaving a bit of our hearts...," wrote Kareena Kapoor
articles.content: New Delhi: Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan, who were busy holidaying in Africa, have jetted off for Mumbai. However, before leaving, the actress made sure to update her fans by dropping a picture on… [+1295 chars]
